meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Bow</kanji> your head to <kanji>conceal</kanji> yourself better than you were <vocabulary>conceal</vocabulary>ing yourself before. If you want to go into <vocabulary>hiding</vocabulary> you need to know how to lay low!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
